name: Halant
description: Halant is a typeface family supporting the Devanagari and Latin scripts. This is an Open Source font family, first published by the Indian Type Foundry in 2014. The Devanagari glyphs in the Halant project were designed by Vivek Sadamate and Ninad Kale. The Latin is by Jonny Pinhorn. The Indian Type Foundry first published Halant in 2014.
author: Indian Type Foundry
